channel.title: Infolob on Tobybase: A Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Infolob on Tobybase: A Tech Blog

item.title: Move Your VM to Oracle Cloud - Part 4
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: In the last of a four-part video series, our Director of Cloud Services Brian Hill creates a new compute instance in Oracle Cloud Compute Services based on his custom Windows virtual machine image.

item.title: Move Your VM to Oracle Cloud - Part 3
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: In part three of a four-part video series, our Director of Cloud Services Brian Hill creates a bootable storage volume in Oracle Cloud Compute Services with his new Windows image.

item.title: Move Your VM to Oracle Cloud - Part 2
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: In part two of a four-part video series, our Director of Cloud Services Brian Hill creates an image in Oracle Cloud Compute Services based on a Windows virtual machine.

item.title: Move Your VM to Oracle Cloud - Part 1
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: In part one of a four-part video series, our Director of Cloud Services Brian Hill demonstrates how to prepare your virtual machine for upload to the cloud.

item.title: Announcing the Infolob YouTube Channel
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: I am honored to work with some wonderful and truly smart folks over at Infolob in Irving, Texas. The company recently started a YouTube channel and we are looking to add lots of great videos soon for your enjoyment and education. Check us out! In this short Oracle Platinum Partner Spotlight video, our Chief Technologist Tim Fox explains what we do as a company and the kinds of services we provide.

item.title: Announcingâ€¦ tobybase.com
item.author: toby.marks@infolob.com (Toby Marks)
item.description: Welcome one and all to my new professional blog, tobybase.com. My name is Toby Marks and I work as a Oracle Consultant at Infolob Solutions in Irving, Texas. My old blog is still up on Tumblr, and there are a few items there that folks still find useful. Most of the content is a bit dated, though, as I’ve been out of the blogging game for a while. This is my attempt to turn that around.
